law.text: An employer that complies with an income-withholding order issued in another state in accordance with this article is not subject to civil liability to an individual or agency with regard to the employer's withholding of child support from the obligor's income.
law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 18, sec. 36, effective June 24, 2015. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 101, sec. 11, effective March 23, 1998.
